question: What trends are observed in the IT landscape based on the deals companies have made as they expand their operational focus on data analytics?

subtasks.task: Identify deals from companies expanding into data analytics. [CompanyDealMaster]
Gather industry IT trends related to those deals. [IndustryITTrend]
Analyze the alignment between deals and IT trends. [IndustryITTrend, CompanyDealMaster]
